mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT s.SOLUTION_ID , s.BOARD_ID , s.SOLUTION_NAME , s.SOLUTION_DESC , s.SOLUTION_DETAIL , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(s.DESC_DETAIL, 4000) AS DESC_DETAIL , s.CREATE_DATE , s.MODIFY_DATE , LISTAGG(DISTINCT h.HASH_NAME, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY s.solution_id) OVER (PARTITION BY s.solution_id) AS hashnames , ( SELECT FILE_PATH FROM IMG_LIST il WHERE il.POST_ID = s.SOLUTION_ID AND il.BOARD_ID = s.BOARD_ID AND ROWNUM = 1 AND IMG_PRIORITY = 1 ) AS POSTER FROM SOLUTION s left outer join IMG_LIST i ON s.SOLUTION_ID = i.POST_ID AND s.BOARD_ID = i.BOARD_ID INNER JOIN ( SELECT hc.CONN_ID, hc.BOARD_ID, h.HASH_ID, h.HASH_NAME FROM HASHTAGS_CONN hc INNER JOIN HASHTAGS h ON hc.HASH_ID = h.HASH_ID ) h ON s.SOLUTION_ID = h.CONN_ID AND s.BOARD_ID = h.BOARD_ID

WITH HASHTABLES AS ( SELECT hc.CONN_ID , hc.BOARD_ID , h.HASH_ID , h.HASH_NAME FROM HASHTAGS_CONN hc INNER JOIN HASHTAGS h ON hc.HASH_ID = h.HASH_ID ) SELECT distinct s.SOLUTION_ID , s.BOARD_ID , s.SOLUTION_NAME , s.SOLUTION_DESC , s.SOLUTION_DETAIL , DBMS_LOB.SUBSTR(s.DESC_DETAIL, 4000) AS DESC_DETAIL , s.CREATE_DATE , s.MODIFY_DATE , (SELECT file_path FROM img_list i WHERE i.post_id = s.solution_id and rownum=1 AND img_priority = 1) AS poster, LISTAGG( CASE WHEN 1=1 THEN i.file_path END, ',') WITHIN GROUP (ORDER BY i.img_priority) OVER (PARTITION BY i.post_id) AS files FROM solution s inner JOIN img_list i ON s.solution_id = i.post_id AND s.board_id = i.board_id LEFT OUTER JOIN HASHTABLES h ON s.SOLUTION_ID = h.CONN_ID AND h.BOARD_ID = 30 where s.solution_id = #{solution_id} order by s.solution_id DESC
